reviews:
Avid Lululemon fan here, with many a-thousands spent on my prized Lulus. These pants are as close to a dupe of Lulu Align joggers I’ve found so far, and for 1/4 of the price. Sure, they’re not that exact buttery soft feeling of their fabric, but they’re pretty damn close (far better than mall brand dupes)! And tbh the material feels like one that’s actually NOT going to pill in high-contact areas.

I’ve put these on when I got them today, and I’m pretty certain I’ll be living in them in the coming months. They’re the perfect blend of jogger/legging that looks great with whatever on top. Perfect for working from home, walking the dog, or anything in between. I will certainly be buying more colours.

5’6” 175lbs, muscular, purchased size Large as per other’s recommendations (usually a medium). Fave amazon clothing purchase so far!
product_name: THE GYM PEOPLE Athletic Joggers for Women Sweatpants with Pockets Workout Tapered Lounge Yoga Pants Women's Leggings

reviews: Absolutely love these pants, the cut, the fabric, everything. I'm 5'5" and 110 pounds but the small was still a bit tight in the waist, and I almost always wear a small in pants. Returned them for a medium. Great value for the money, I like them as much or more than my Lululemon joggers that cost 3 times as much.
product_name: THE GYM PEOPLE Athletic Joggers for Women Sweatpants with Pockets Workout Tapered Lounge Yoga Pants Women's Leggings

reviews:
When I pulled size medium out of the bag, I thought it was going to be too small. The waist is tiny. When I put them on, however, they fit like a glove. It's like leggings and joggers had a baby. Fitting with just a little bit of room. I ordered 2 other pairs, including a large pair for a looser fit and longer leg. The large is just a wee bit roomier. The fabric is super stretchy and smooth. I love the tapered ankle, the pockets and the high waist. Decent quality, especially for the price. I haven't washed them yet.
For reference, I'm 5'7, 150lbs, and usually wear Lulu 8 or gap M.
product_name: THE GYM PEOPLE Athletic Joggers for Women Sweatpants with Pockets Workout Tapered Lounge Yoga Pants Women's Leggings

reviews: These may be the softest, most comfortable pants I've ever worn. They have a high waist band that fits snug but not uncomfortable at all. I'm 6ft tall so they are definitely on the short side of a Capri pant for me but that's usual and I think it looks great anyways. I pull them up a little to give more of a jogging pant look anyways. The pockets are deep and flat against the front thigh. Now, the only thing I hate to say about them because they are so comfy is they aren't the most flattering pant I've ever worn, especially on my bum. The fabric doesn't hide cellulite well and it's a bit clingy and shiny so it just doesn't flatter that part of my body. That could be remedied by going up a size because they definitely fit snug but I would say true to their sizing chart. Again, I'm 6 ft and 180lbs and ordered Large so these will fit completely different on someone else. That being said, I still love these pants and wear them with a little longer shirt to hide the one part I don't love. They washed and dried no problem and my dog's hair doesn't cling to this fabric so I'm all about them. For the price, they are fantastic and I'm thinking I'll order another pair up a size to see if it makes a different in the fit. Also worn them to work out and honestly couldn't be happier with their versatility and comfort.
product_name: THE GYM PEOPLE Athletic Joggers for Women Sweatpants with Pockets Workout Tapered Lounge Yoga Pants Women's Leggings

review_title: Fits small. Definitely need to size up.
reviews: These are not sweatpants as I remember. They are made with some kind of stretchy polyester similar to lulu leggings. They stretch well and seem quite comfortable. I usually wear a Size S or Medium but decided to size up based on the reviews. I receive a size L because I prefer my clothes to be loose fitting. I’m glad I did because the size L is not large. Fits like a medium.
product_name: THE GYM PEOPLE Athletic Joggers for Women Sweatpants with Pockets Workout Tapered Lounge Yoga Pants Women's Leggings

review_title: Perfect for workout or very casual dressing
reviews:
These are great casual pants. However were I a tall person they would be a bit short. I am 5’ 1” and they are just about the right length. I also recommend ordering a size larger than you normally would for overall fit.
The material is a bit shinier than I anticipated but not so much so that I would not wear them. They styling is similar to the LuLu On The Fly pant but they are not exactly the same, as some others have stated. The waist is not draw string, the cuff is made from the same material as the pant, they are not double layered and are a different material.
The are smooth against the skin and very, very comfortable.
product_name: THE GYM PEOPLE Athletic Joggers for Women Sweatpants with Pockets Workout Tapered Lounge Yoga Pants Women's Leggings

reviews: They are similar to the lulu align jogger in style but that’s where the comparison ends. They’re just ok. I find the material a little scratchy, doesn’t have flat seams and has a fairly wide elastic at the top of the waist band. They’re more of a bathing suit material. I’m 5’4 and the full length are perfect for me. They will work for what I want them for which is basically lounging and working from home but I’d rather spend the money on the lulu’s. Can’t speak to longevity or how they will stand up to the washing machine. If you’re working on a budget they’re not bad and a cute style.
product_name: THE GYM PEOPLE Athletic Joggers for Women Sweatpants with Pockets Workout Tapered Lounge Yoga Pants Women's Leggings

review_title: I can wear these every day
reviews: I'm 5"4 and 126lbs and the medium was perfect. These joggers are a cool hybrid between leggings and casual sweatpants and you can wear them with any top. Love them!
product_name: THE GYM PEOPLE Athletic Joggers for Women Sweatpants with Pockets Workout Tapered Lounge Yoga Pants Women's Leggings

reviews: Love the feel of the material. Right now I'm in between sizes from an x large to xx large. I ordered an x large and it fit great. A little snug around the waist however the material is very stretchy. This would be great for the summer are for lounging around the house. I was so happy with the product I ordered two more pair. I'm 5"1, and 180 pounds. The long joggers fit me just right in length. Keep in mind I have not washed them yet and I will keep you updated on how they wash.
product_name: THE GYM PEOPLE Athletic Joggers for Women Sweatpants with Pockets Workout Tapered Lounge Yoga Pants Women's Leggings

reviews: I love how soft, it is light weighted and the fabric is stretchy, i love the feeling of the fabric and the way my full hips look like in them. It is also comfy enough for wearing at home for a long day. I also like the side deep pockets so I can put my phone inside it’s a perfect fit, Also so then my husband won’t complain how revealing my pants are.
product_name: THE GYM PEOPLE Athletic Joggers for Women Sweatpants with Pockets Workout Tapered Lounge Yoga Pants Women's Leggings

reviews: I got the capri length ones in large and I'm glad I did because as a short person (5' 1") they are almost full length on me. But the cuffs are wide and stretchy and soft so I can sort of scrunch them up a bit to capri length and they look and feel great. Surprisingly flattering. The fabric is synthetic, stretchy, and kinda feels like swimsuit fabric, but I sized up a bit to allow for my generous thighs, so they're fitted but not skin tight in the thighs and hips. So comfy I could forget I'm wearing them.
product_name: THE GYM PEOPLE Athletic Joggers for Women Sweatpants with Pockets Workout Tapered Lounge Yoga Pants Women's Leggings

reviews: I’m 5’7” & 135lbs - I carry my weight in my hips and thighs rather than in my stomach > I followed the other reviews and sized up from my regular medium to a large and they fit incredibly well. The material is like a stretchy legging material and I was worried I’d just bought oversized leggings for a second but they fit exactly as expected. They’re great joggers for working from home or going out. The shape is flattering and the waistband is soft yet somewhat supportive. I feel like I look less bloated wearing these. Giving 5 stars but it should be noted that I haven’t washed them yet so the rating couldn’t change.
product_name: THE GYM PEOPLE Athletic Joggers for Women Sweatpants with Pockets Workout Tapered Lounge Yoga Pants Women's Leggings

review_title: Could these be my new favorite pants?
reviews:
These looked a little too shiny when I took them out of the package at first (I don't know why I thought they would just be dark cotton black - they are clearly not cotton) and they had some creases from being folded up, but I put them in the dryer for a bit to get the creases out.

I LOVE the way these fit - I have tried lots of different kinds of joggers (not expensive ones, usually less than $40) and they are usually really baggy near the ankles or at the back (I understand they are supposed to be somewhat baggy as they are not leggings). These feel like fancy sweatpants. They can actually be dressed up quite easily because they are not cotton and won't look old and pilled up quickly. They fit snug in the right places and have awesome roomy pockets, I think I had my hands in pockets for most of the day when I wore them :)

Very comfortable, very flattering, very happy with these pants for the price!
product_name: THE GYM PEOPLE Athletic Joggers for Women Sweatpants with Pockets Workout Tapered Lounge Yoga Pants Women's Leggings

reviews: These pants are so comfortable, I always wear gym leggings to workout in, at work, and to climb in but I wanted to give joggers a try. These joggers are a perfect combination between leggings and thin sweat pants. They are fitted in the butt area, but a little loose in the legs so they feel breathable and more comfortable, could definitely live in these. I always wear high waisted leggings so the height of these is perfect for me. I wore these climbing and then to work right after (I work at a gym), but they do look very nice to wear out and about as well. The material is very smooth and easy to wipe off if you get chalk or dog hair on them which is a plus for me! Want to get another pair so I can actually wear them everyday. I am 5’3 137 lbs and have an athletic build and got a size M
product_name: THE GYM PEOPLE Athletic Joggers for Women Sweatpants with Pockets Workout Tapered Lounge Yoga Pants Women's Leggings

reviews: I love these joggers! They fit a little on the snug side in my opinion, I ordered an XL and was hoping for a looser fit but thats no big deal. They are still super flattering being a little more tight fit. Great material and length! And I am 5'11 so hard to come by. Will definitely be buying another pair.
product_name: THE GYM PEOPLE Athletic Joggers for Women Sweatpants with Pockets Workout Tapered Lounge Yoga Pants Women's Leggings

reviews: I like the high waisted joggers. I really like the stylish design because two deep pockets are more convenient for me to put the keys and phone when I run outside. It is incredibly comfortable but not too tight. Look so cool, wearing so smooth. The material is very soft. The size is great fit. How amazing it is! It is perfect length too.
product_name: THE GYM PEOPLE Athletic Joggers for Women Sweatpants with Pockets Workout Tapered Lounge Yoga Pants Women's Leggings

review_title: Short legs need not apply haha
reviews: If you want high waisted pants - and I’m talking all the way up to your bra - these are for you. Very Obvious polyester look and feel. They’d likely be best for someone with long legs.
product_name: THE GYM PEOPLE Athletic Joggers for Women Sweatpants with Pockets Workout Tapered Lounge Yoga Pants Women's Leggings

reviews: These pants are so comfy and what's great is that the material is. Really great quality and a bonus is that dog hair/cat hair wint stick to them so you dont have to constantly lift roll. Definitely will be buying more .
product_name: THE GYM PEOPLE Athletic Joggers for Women Sweatpants with Pockets Workout Tapered Lounge Yoga Pants Women's Leggings

reviews:
These joggers are a dream! So they're pretty much a Lulu Align Jogger dupe. I have the Align's and the main difference is the fabric (this one is more slick, rather than buttery cotton feel).

These joggers are fitted and high waisted. They fit pretty snug through the hip and thigh and are a bit looser through the calf. If you want a true "jogger" feel, you might want to size up. They are also ankle skimming (I'm 5'2), so if you're taller it may be a capri or crop. I'm a size 6 in Lulu and went with a Small.
product_name: THE GYM PEOPLE Athletic Joggers for Women Sweatpants with Pockets Workout Tapered Lounge Yoga Pants Women's Leggings

reviews:
I love these joggers! They are super comfy, flattering and can totally be dressed up for work. I am hoping The Gym People makes a full length pair in a thicker material for the cooler months. I ordered one pair to try, and ordered a second pair the day the first ones arrived. Totally recommend.

I am 5’9 and usually wear 8-10 in lulus. Large in these fit perfectly.
product_name: THE GYM PEOPLE Athletic Joggers for Women Sweatpants with Pockets Workout Tapered Lounge Yoga Pants Women's Leggings

reviews: These pants look good and overall I was happy with them after trying them on. However, I put them through the wash after checking the fit and the seam on the thigh is already coming undone. This is after 1 wash, no wear, and no dryer. That's pretty unacceptable.
product_name: THE GYM PEOPLE Athletic Joggers for Women Sweatpants with Pockets Workout Tapered Lounge Yoga Pants Women's Leggings

reviews:

The material feels like really good quality and if it weren't for the stitching coming undone after 1 day of wear, I'd give it 5/5 stars.

They really do seem like a replica of the Lululemon Align Joggers.
product_name: THE GYM PEOPLE Athletic Joggers for Women Sweatpants with Pockets Workout Tapered Lounge Yoga Pants Women's Leggings
